<![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
    <LayoutDefinition xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">

  <Value><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">

    <OBJECT ID="RSClientPrint" CLASSID="CLSID:5554DCB0-700B-498D-9B58-4E40E5814405" CODEBASE="\\anflonorth-web\RSClientPrintControl\RSClientPrint-x86.cab" VIEWASTEXT></OBJECT>

    <script type="text/javascript">
    //$(document).ready(function() {
    //    $("table .ttc").css({ background: "ffffff" }).hover(
    //        function() { $(this).css({ background: "#C1DAD7" }); },
    //        function() { $(this).css({ background: "#ffffff" }); }
    //        );

    function ShowAlert(titletext,message,note){
    //if (e) {e.returnValue = false;}
    titletext = titletext.replace(' ','&nbsp;');//&#32
    var tag = "<div id='alerter' title=" + titletext + "><span class='ui-icon ui-icon-alert' style='float:left; margin:0 7px 20px 0;'></span><p>" + message + "</p><p><i><b>Note </b>" + note + "</p></i></div>";
    $('#alerter').remove();
    $(tag).appendTo(document.body);
    $(function(){
    $('#alerter').dialog({
    //autoOpen: false,
    show: 'drop',
    hide: 'drop',
    width: 480,
    height: 320,
    modal: true,
    buttons: {
    "Ok": function() {
    $(this).dialog("close");
    }
    }
    })});
    $('#alerter').dialog('open');
    }

    function RunIE() {
    File="iexplore.exe http://agridata/gpwx";
    WSH=new ActiveXObject("WScript.Shell");
    WSH.run(File);
    }

    function ShowBrowserAlert(titletext,message,note){
    titletext = titletext.replace(' ','&nbsp;');//&#32
    var tag = "<div id='browseralerter' title=" + titletext + "><span class='ui-icon ui-icon-alert' style='float:left; margin:0 7px 20px 0;'></span><p>" + message + "</p><p><i><b>Note </b>" + note + "</p></i></div>";
    $('#browseralerter').remove();
    $(tag).appendTo(document.body);
    $(function(){
    $('#browseralerter').dialog({
    //autoOpen: false,
    show: 'drop',
    hide: 'drop',
    width: 480,
    height: 320,
    modal: true,
    buttons: {
    "Ok": function() {
    $(this).dialog("close");
    }
    }
    })});
    $('#browseralerter').dialog('open');
    }
    function ShowConfirm(e,titletext,message,note){
    if (e) {e.returnValue = false;}
    titletext = titletext.replace(' ','&nbsp;');//&#32
    var tag = "<div id='dialog' title=" + titletext + "><span class='ui-icon ui-icon-help' style='float:left; margin:0 7px 20px 0;'></span><p>" + message + "</p><p><i><b>Note </b>" + note + "</p></i></div>";
    $('#dialog').remove();
    $(tag).appendTo(document.body);
    $(function(){
    $('#dialog').dialog({
    autoOpen: false,
    show: 'drop',
    hide: 'drop',
    width: 480,
    height: 320,
    modal: true,
    buttons: {
    "Ok": function() {
    //var ret = $(this).dialog('option', 'srcElement');
    //var obj = document.getElementById($(this).dialog('option', 'srcElement').name);
    __doPostBack($(this).dialog('option', 'srcElement').name,'');
    $(this).dialog("close");
    },
    "Cancel": function() {
    $(this).dialog("close");
    }
    }
    })});
    if (e) {$('#dialog').dialog('option', 'srcElement', e.srcElement).dialog('open');}
    else {$('#dialog').dialog('open');}
    //$('#dialog').dialog('option', 'srcElement', e.srcElement).dialog('open');
    }
    function ShowConfirmtest(e,titletext,message,note,dropdown){			
			if (e) {e.returnValue = false;}			
			titletext = titletext.replace(' ','&nbsp;');//&#32
			var ddl = document.getElementById(dropdown);
			var tag = "<div id='dialog' title=" + titletext + "><span class='ui-icon ui-icon-help' style='float:left; margin:0 7px 20px 0;'></span><p>" + message + "</p><p><i><b>Note </b>" + note + "</p><p><i><b>Reject To:  </b><i></i><select id='dropdwon2' style='padding:5px;font-size: 12px;line-height: 1; border: 0; border-radius: 0; height: 20px;background=transparent;' ></select></i></p></i></div>";
			$('#dialog').remove();
			$(tag).appendTo(document.body);
			$('#' + dropdown + ' option').clone().appendTo('#dropdwon2');
			$(function(){						
					$('#dialog').dialog({
						autoOpen: false,
						show: 'drop',
						hide: 'drop',
						width: 480,
						height: 320,
						modal: true,
						buttons: {
							"Ok": function() {	
							var receiver = document.getElementById('dropdwon2');
					
							var recVal = receiver.options[receiver.selectedIndex].value;
							ddl.value = recVal;
							__doPostBack($(this).dialog('option', 'srcElement').name,'');
								$(this).dialog("close");								
							}, 
							"Cancel": function() { 	
								$(this).dialog("close");								
							} 
						}
					})});
			if (e) {$('#dialog').dialog('option', 'srcElement', e.srcElement).dialog('open');}
			else {$('#dialog').dialog('open');}
			//$('#dialog').dialog('option', 'srcElement', e.srcElement).dialog('open');
		}
    function ShowConfirm2(e,titletext,message,note,SubmitFunc){
    if (e) {e.returnValue = false;}
    titletext = titletext.replace(' ','&nbsp;');
    var tag = "<div id='dialog' title=" + titletext + "><span class='ui-icon ui-icon-help' style='float:left; margin:0 7px 20px 0;'></span><p>" + message + "</p><p><i><b>Note </b>" + note + "</p></i></div>";
    $('#dialog').remove();
    $(tag).appendTo(document.body);
    $(function(){
    $('#dialog').dialog({
    autoOpen: false,
    show: 'drop',
    hide: 'drop',
    width: 480,
    height: 320,
    modal: true,
    buttons: {
    "Ok": function() {
    SubmitFunc();
    __doPostBack($(this).dialog('option', 'srcElement').name,'');
    $(this).dialog("close");
    },
    "Cancel": function() {
    $(this).dialog("close");
    }
    }
    })});
    if (e) {$('#dialog').dialog('option', 'srcElement', e.srcElement).dialog('open');}
    else {$('#dialog').dialog('open');}
    }
    function ShowConfirmVoid(e,titletext,message,note,message2,note2){
    e.returnValue = false;
    titletext = titletext.replace(' ','&nbsp;');//&#32
    var tag1 = "<div id='void' title=" + titletext + "><span class='ui-icon ui-icon-alert' style='float:left; margin:0 7px 20px 0;'></span><p>" + message + "</p><p><i><b>Note </b>" + note + "</p></i></div>";
    var tag2 = "<div id='void2' title=" + titletext + "><span class='ui-icon ui-icon-help' style='float:left; margin:0 7px 20px 0;'></span><p>" + message2 + "</p><p><i><b>Note </b>" + note2 + "</p></i></div>";
    $('#void').remove();
    $('#void2').remove();
    $(tag1).appendTo(document.body);
    $(tag2).appendTo(document.body);
    $(function(){
    $('#void2').dialog({
    autoOpen: false,
    show: 'drop',
    hide: 'drop',
    width: 480,
    height: 320,
    modal: true,
    buttons: {
    "Ok": function() {
    var control_name = $(this).dialog('option', 'name');
    //var obj = document.getElementById($(this).dialog('option', 'srcElement').name);
    __doPostBack(control_name,'');
    $(this).dialog("close");
    },
    "Cancel": function() {
    $(this).dialog("close");
    }
    }
    });
    $('#void').dialog({
    autoOpen: false,
    show: 'drop',
    hide: 'drop',
    width: 480,
    height: 320,
    modal: true,
    buttons: {
    "Ok": function() {
    //var ret = $(this).dialog('option', 'srcElement');
    //var obj = document.getElementById($(this).dialog('option', 'srcElement').name);
    //__doPostBack($(this).dialog('option', 'srcElement').name,'');
    $(this).dialog("close");
    $('#void2').dialog('option', 'name', $(this).dialog('option', 'srcElement').name).dialog('open');
    },
    "Cancel": function() {
    $(this).dialog("close");
    }
    }
    })});
    $('#void').dialog('option', 'srcElement', e.srcElement).dialog('open');
    }
    function jq_toggle_col_vis(table,cols) {
    cols=cols*1;
    for (var col=3; col<=cols+2; col++) {
    $('#' + table + ' tr:nth-child(' + col + '),td:nth-child(' + col + ')').show();
    $('#' + table + ' td:nth-child(' + col + '),th:nth-child(' + col + ')').show();
    }
    for (var col=cols+3; col<=12; col++) {
    $('#' + table + ' tr:nth-child(' + col + '),td:nth-child(' + col + ')').hide();
    $('#' + table + ' td:nth-child(' + col + '),th:nth-child(' + col + ')').hide();
    }
    for (var col=cols+3; col<=12; col++) {
    $('#' + table + ' td:nth-child(' + col + '),tr:nth-child(' + col + ')').show();
    }
    }
    function jq_toggle_col_vis2(table,control) {
    var target = document.getElementById(control);
    var cols = target.value;
    cols=cols*1;
    for (var col=3; col<=cols+2; col++) {
    $('#' + table + ' tr:nth-child(' + col + '),td:nth-child(' + col + ')').show();
    $('#' + table + ' td:nth-child(' + col + '),th:nth-child(' + col + ')').show();
    }
    for (var col=cols+3; col<=12; col++) {
    $('#' + table + ' tr:nth-child(' + col + '),td:nth-child(' + col + ')').hide();
    $('#' + table + ' td:nth-child(' + col + '),th:nth-child(' + col + ')').hide();
    }
    for (var col=cols+3; col<=12; col++) {
    $('#' + table + ' td:nth-child(' + col + '),tr:nth-child(' + col + ')').show();
    }
    }
    </script>
    </head>

  <script type="text/javascript"  language="javascript">
  function OpenCustomerSelector(target)
  {
  var width  = 640;
  var height = 480;
  var left   = (screen.width  - width)/2;
  var top    = (screen.height - height)/2;
  var params = 'width='+width+', height='+height;
  params += ', top='+top+', left='+left;
  params += ', directories=no';
  params += ', location=no';
  params += ', menubar=no';
  params += ', resizable=yes';
  params += ', scrollbars=yes';
  params += ', status=no';
  params += ', toolbar=no';
  params += ', modal=yes';

  var url = '../wf_pr/Selector_Reference_CAR.aspx?target=' + target; window.open(url, '', params);
  }

  function OpenRptSelector(RptID,RptPath,RptDesc,RptType,paramCo)
  {
  var width  = 700;
  var height = 400;
  var left   = (screen.width  - width)/2;
  var top    = (screen.height - height)/2;
  var params = 'width='+width+', height='+height;
  params += ', top='+top+', left='+left;
  params += ', directories=no';
  params += ', location=no';
  params += ', menubar=no';
  params += ', resizable=yes';
  params += ', scrollbars=yes';
  params += ', status=no';
  params += ', toolbar=no';
  params += ', modal=yes';

  var Company = document.getElementById(paramCo);

  var CompanyText = Company.options[Company.selectedIndex].value;
  if (CompanyText == "DICT") { CompanyText = "DICT"; }
  var url = '../WFinRep_Head/Select_ReportList.aspx?W_Rpt_ID=' + RptID + '&W_Rpt_Server_Path=' + RptPath  + '&W_Rpt_Desc=' + RptDesc + '&W_Rpt_Type=' + RptType + '&W_Rpt_Co=' + CompanyText;
  window.open(url, '', params);

  }

  function UpdateRpt(FirstValue,SecondValue,ThirdValue)
  {
  var rptID = window.opener.document.all('<%# Request.Params("W_Rpt_ID")%>');
  var rptPath = window.opener.document.all('<%# Request.Params("W_Rpt_Server_Path")%>');
  var rptDesc = window.opener.document.all('<%# Request.Params("W_Rpt_Desc")%>');
  rptID.value = FirstValue;
  rptPath.value = SecondValue;
  rptDesc.value = ThirdValue;
  rptPath.fireEvent('onChange');
  window.close();
  }

  function OpenRptViewer(Control1, Control2, Control3, Control4, companyCtrl, Control5 , Control6)
  {
  var width  = 1200;
  var height = 700;
  var left   = (screen.width  - width)/2;
  var top    = (screen.height - height)/2;
  var params = 'width='+width+', height='+height;
  params += ', top='+top+', left='+left;
  params += ', directories=no';
  params += ', location=no';
  params += ', menubar=no';
  params += ', resizable=yes';
  params += ', scrollbars=yes';
  params += ', status=no';
  params += ', toolbar=no';
  params += ', modal=yes';

  var type1 = document.getElementById(Control3);
  var type2 = document.getElementById(Control1);
  var type3 = document.getElementById(Control2);
  var type4 = document.getElementById(Control4);
  var Company = document.getElementById(companyCtrl);
  var type5 = document.getElementById(Control5);
  var type6 = document.getElementById(Control6);
  var CompanyText = Company.options[Company.selectedIndex].text;


  var url = '../WFinRep_Head/WFin_RepView.aspx?Control1=' + type2.value + '&Control2=' + type3.value + '&Control3=' + type1.value + '&Control4=' + type4.value + '&compDB=' + CompanyText + '&Control5=' + type5.value + '&Control6=' + type6.value;
  window.open(url, '', params);

  }

  function OpenRptViewerApp(Control1, Control2, Control3, Control4)
				{
					var width  = 1024;
					var height = 600;
					var left   = (screen.width  - width)/2;
					var top    = (screen.height - height)/2;
					var params = 'width='+width+', height='+height;
					params += ', top='+top+', left='+left;
					params += ', directories=no';
					params += ', location=no';
					params += ', menubar=no';
					params += ', resizable=yes';
					params += ', scrollbars=yes';
					params += ', status=no';
					params += ', toolbar=no';
					params += ', modal=yes';
					
					var RepYear = document.getElementById(Control1);
					var RepMo = document.getElementById(Control2);
					var RepComp = document.getElementById(Control3);
					var RepType = document.getElementById(Control4);
					
					
					var selectedText;

					if (RepComp.nodeName == "SELECT") {
					 selectedText = RepComp.options[RepComp.selectedIndex].text; }
					else {
					 selectedText = RepComp.value
					}
				  	var url = '../WFinRep_Head1/WFin-RepInquiryView1.aspx?Control1=' + RepYear.value + '&Control2=' + RepMo.value + '&Control3=' + selectedText + '&Control4=' + RepType.value;
				  	window.open(url, '', params);
					  
										
				}

  function Print_SSRS(ServerPath,Parameters,ReportTitle)
  {
  RSClientPrint.MarginLeft = 0.3;
  RSClientPrint.MarginTop = 0.3;
  RSClientPrint.MarginRight = 0.3;
  RSClientPrint.MarginBottom = 0.3;
  //RSClientPrint.Culture = 1033;
  //RSClientPrint.UICulture = 9;
  RSClientPrint.Authenticate = true;
  RSClientPrint.Print(ServerPath, Parameters, ReportTitle);
  }
